item.description:
THIS IS NOT A GWH SPONSORED EVENT.  VISIT THIS LINK FOR MORE INFORMATION

American Humanist Association conference in Cambridge from April 7 to 10. Richard Dawkins, Steven Pinker, Rebecca Goldstein, Steve Wozniak, and many, many others will be there. It will be a great time, and the AHA conference doesn't stop in Boston very often, so please plan on being part of this big event!

Sunday, April 10th
Registration (Main Lobby) 8:00am-12:00pm Exhibitors and EvolveFish Humanist Bookstore (Main Lobby) 9:00am-1:00pm

Church-State Plenary

  • Sean Faircloth
  • Cecil Bothwell
9:00am-10:15am

Closing Plenary

  • Jeff Sharlet
10:30am-12:00pm A Skeptic’s Tour of Salem – Separate registration and $89 fee required 1:00pm-6:00pm
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be all over the place, but we'll most likely have our GWH nametags...
item.name: 70th Anniversary Conference of the American Humanist Association
